thread.title: I Avoided the Norovirus, but I Caught the Curling Bug

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: I Avoided the Norovirus, but I Caught the Curling Bug
text:
Gangneung, South Korea 
When these Olympics are over, I’m going back to my old job writing about North Korea, its ruling family, its nuclear and missile program and its fight against global sanctions.
Until then, I’m covering the only thing that can rival it for drama and excitement. I’m writing about women’s curling.
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
